entry.p: No explicit limit, use best known routing practices.
Reference planes can be continuous ground or continuous power that have low frequency peak to peak noise. Ground referencing is preferred.
Refer to USB4 ESD approved list in Hayden Re-timer collateral. refer to RDC #631030
Nominal 100 nF recommended (75 nF to 200 nF including tolerance).
Applies to Hayden Bridge topology. Consult re-timer collateral for exact Aux channel implementation requirements. Refer to RDC #631030
An edge rate reduction mechanism may be needed to comply with DisplayPort maximum Aux slew rate specification dependent on the retimer's Aux implementation.
